description:
GLPI Dashboard
Show somes informations on tickets

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  faixa_valores.faixa,
  CONCAT(IFNULL(ROUND((COUNT(chamados.id) / total) * 100), 0),"%") AS percentual,
  COUNT(chamados.id) quantidade,
  IFNULL(chamados.total, 0) Total
FROM (SELECT DISTINCT
    (SELECT
        COUNT(*)
      FROM glpi_tickets t
      WHERE t.type = 1
      AND t.is_deleted = 0
  AND (IF(glpi_tickets.time_to_resolve IS NOT NULL
  AND glpi_tickets.status <> 4
  AND (glpi_tickets.solvedate > glpi_tickets.time_to_resolve
  OR (glpi_tickets.solvedate IS NULL
  AND glpi_tickets.time_to_resolve < NOW())), 1, 0) = 1)
  ) AS total,
    DATE_FORMAT(glpi_tickets.date_creation, '%Y%m%d') AS ano_mes,
    glpi_tickets.id AS id,
    glpi_tickets.name,
    glpi_tickets.content AS descricao,
    glpi_tickets.status AS cod_status,
    glpi_entities.completename,
    glpi_tickets.date_mod,
    glpi_tickets.date,
    glpi_tickets.type,
    REPLACE(REPLACE(glpi_tickets.type, 1, 'Incidente'), 2, 'Requisição') AS ds_tipo,
    glpi_tickets.priority,
    GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT glpi_users_a5e2026cbcb683e774f93a59e24a62a4.id SEPARATOR '-') glpi_users_id,
    GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT CONCAT(glpi_tickets_users_d1524bb2ea1d461ab90aed3b5f0e7e60.users_id, ' ', glpi_tickets_users_d1524bb2ea1d461ab90aed3b5f0e7e60.alternative_email) SEPARATOR '-') AS users_id_alternative_email,
    GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT glpi_users_f201be21cd638ee780d08cba4ceff0d4.id SEPARATOR '-') AS glpi_users_id2,
    GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT CONCAT(glpi_tickets_users_819efb92c8b927b345e489211ec8e43b.users_id, ' ', glpi_tickets_users_819efb92c8b927b345e489211ec8e43b.alternative_email) SEPARATOR '-') AS users_id_alternative_email2,
    GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT CONCAT(IFNULL(glpi_groups_1358be41ea7158319a888236ffba5355.completename, '__NULL__'), '-', glpi_groups_1358be41ea7158319a888236ffba5355.id)
    ORDER BY glpi_groups_1358be41ea7158319a888236ffba5355.id SEPARATOR '-') AS glpi_groups_id,
    glpi_itilcategories.completename AS itilcategories_name,
    glpi_tickets.time_to_resolve AS time_to_resolve2,
    SEC_TO_TIME(takeintoaccount_delay_stat) sec_takeintoaccount_delay_stat,
    GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT CONCAT(IFNULL(glpi_tickets.takeintoaccount_delay_stat, '__NULL__'), '-', glpi_tickets.id) ORDER BY glpi_tickets.id SEPARATOR '$$##$$') AS takeintoaccount_delay_stat,
    GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT CONCAT(IFNULL(glpi_taskcategories_e5ca2f53018fdc28a31faf534186b3a2.name, '__NULL__'), '$#$', glpi_taskcategories_e5ca2f53018fdc28a31faf534186b3a2.id)
    ORDER BY glpi_taskcategories_e5ca2f53018fdc28a31faf534186b3a2.id SEPARATOR '$$##$$') AS categoria,
    glpi_slas_slas_id_ttr_f3aab278f60e510b77ec99388d401d84.name AS SLA,
    GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT CONCAT(IFNULL(glpi_slalevels_b3496fc202f417bdbcf7196c9852bb44.name, '__NULL__'), '$#$', glpi_slalevels_b3496fc202f417bdbcf7196c9852bb44.id)
    ORDER BY glpi_slalevels_b3496fc202f417bdbcf7196c9852bb44.id SEPARATOR '-') AS nivel_sla,
    glpi_slas_slas_id_tto_bb5aab1a526f6069c73375c529fafec7.name AS slas_id_tto_name,
    glpi_tickets.closedate,
    glpi_tickets.solvedate,
    glpi_tickets.time_to_own,
    glpi_tickets.time_to_resolve,
    NOW() data_atual,
    SEC_TO_TIME(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, NOW(), time_to_resolve)) differenca,
    glpi_tickets.status AS status3,
    (SELECT
        REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(sla.definition_time, 'hour', 60), 'minute', 1), 'day', 1440) * sla.number_time * 60
      FROM glpi_slas sla
      WHERE sla.id = glpi_tickets.slas_id_ttr) sla_em_segundos,
    SEC_TO_TIME((SELECT
        REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(sla.definition_time, 'hour', 60), 'minute', 1), 'day', 1440) * sla.number_time * 60
      FROM glpi_slas sla
      WHERE sla.id = glpi_tickets.slas_id_ttr)) AS tempo_sla_chamado,
    SEC_TO_TIME((SELECT
        REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(sla.definition_time, 'hour', 60), 'minute', 1), 'day', 1440) * sla.number_time * 60
      FROM glpi_slas sla
      WHERE sla.id = glpi_tickets.slas_id_ttr) - (TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, NOW(), time_to_resolve))) tempo_consumido,
    ((((SELECT
        REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(sla.definition_time, 'hour', 60), 'minute', 1), 'day', 1440) * sla.number_time * 60
      FROM glpi_slas sla
      WHERE sla.id = glpi_tickets.slas_id_ttr) - (TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, NOW(), time_to_resolve))) / (SELECT
        REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(sla.definition_time, 'hour', 60), 'minute', 1), 'day', 1440) * sla.number_time * 60
      FROM glpi_slas sla
      WHERE sla.id = glpi_tickets.slas_id_ttr)) * 100) AS percSLAConsumido,
    IFNULL((CASE WHEN ((((SELECT
            REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(sla.definition_time, 'hour', 60), 'minute', 1), 'day', 1440) * sla.number_time * 60
          FROM glpi_slas sla
          WHERE sla.id = glpi_tickets.slas_id_ttr) - (TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, NOW(), time_to_resolve))) / (SELECT
            REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(sla.definition_time, 'hour', 60), 'minute', 1), 'day', 1440) * sla.number_time * 60
          FROM glpi_slas sla
          WHERE sla.id = glpi_tickets.slas_id_ttr)) * 100) < 70 THEN 69 WHEN ((((SELECT
            REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(sla.definition_time, 'hour', 60), 'minute', 1), 'day', 1440) * sla.number_time * 60
          FROM glpi_slas sla
          WHERE sla.id = glpi_tickets.slas_id_ttr) - (TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, NOW(), time_to_resolve))) / (SELECT
            REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(sla.definition_time, 'hour', 60), 'minute', 1), 'day', 1440) * sla.number_time * 60
          FROM glpi_slas sla
          WHERE sla.id = glpi_tickets.slas_id_ttr)) * 100) >= 70 AND
        ((((SELECT
            REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(sla.definition_time, 'hour', 60), 'minute', 1), 'day', 1440) * sla.number_time * 60
          FROM glpi_slas sla
          WHERE sla.id = glpi_tickets.slas_id_ttr) - (TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, NOW(), time_to_resolve))) / (SELECT
            REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(sla.definition_time, 'hour', 60), 'minute', 1), 'day', 1440) * sla.number_time * 60
          FROM glpi_slas sla
          WHERE sla.id = glpi_tickets.slas_id_ttr)) * 100) < 90 THEN 70 WHEN ((((SELECT
            REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(sla.definition_time, 'hour', 60), 'minute', 1), 'day', 1440) * sla.number_time * 60
          FROM glpi_slas sla
          WHERE sla.id = glpi_tickets.slas_id_ttr) - (TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, NOW(), time_to_resolve))) / (SELECT
            REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(sla.definition_time, 'hour', 60), 'minute', 1), 'day', 1440) * sla.number_time * 60
          FROM glpi_slas sla
          WHERE sla.id = glpi_tickets.slas_id_ttr)) * 100) >= 90 AND
        ((((SELECT
            REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(sla.definition_time, 'hour', 60), 'minute', 1), 'day', 1440) * sla.number_time * 60
          FROM glpi_slas sla
          WHERE sla.id = glpi_tickets.slas_id_ttr) - (TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, NOW(), time_to_resolve))) / (SELECT
            REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(sla.definition_time, 'hour', 60), 'minute', 1), 'day', 1440) * sla.number_time * 60
          FROM glpi_slas sla
          WHERE sla.id = glpi_tickets.slas_id_ttr)) * 100) <= 100 THEN 90 WHEN ((((SELECT
            REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(sla.definition_time, 'hour', 60), 'minute', 1), 'day', 1440) * sla.number_time * 60
          FROM glpi_slas sla
          WHERE sla.id = glpi_tickets.slas_id_ttr) - (TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, NOW(), time_to_resolve))) / (SELECT
            REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(sla.definition_time, 'hour', 60), 'minute', 1), 'day', 1440) * sla.number_time * 60
          FROM glpi_slas sla
          WHERE sla.id = glpi_tickets.slas_id_ttr)) * 100) > 100 THEN 101 END), 69) AS perc_calc_sla,
    IF(glpi_tickets.time_to_resolve IS NOT NULL AND glpi_tickets.status <> 4 AND (glpi_tickets.solvedate > glpi_tickets.time_to_resolve OR (glpi_tickets.solvedate IS NULL AND glpi_tickets.time_to_resolve < NOW())), 'execido termpo atend', 'dentro do tempo') AS time_exceded_solution,
    GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT CONCAT(IFNULL(glpi_tickets.solve_delay_stat, '__NULL__'), '->', glpi_tickets.id)
    ORDER BY glpi_tickets.id SEPARATOR '$$##$$') AS solve_delay_stat_and_id,
    GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT CONCAT(IFNULL(glpi_tickets.waiting_duration, '__NULL__'), '->', glpi_tickets.id)
    ORDER BY glpi_tickets.id SEPARATOR '$$##$$') AS waiting_duration_and_id
  FROM glpi_tickets
    LEFT JOIN glpi_entities
      ON (glpi_tickets.entities_id = glpi_entities.id)
    LEFT JOIN glpi_tickets_users AS glpi_tickets_users_d1524bb2ea1d461ab90aed3b5f0e7e60
      ON (glpi_tickets.id = glpi_tickets_users_d1524bb2ea1d461ab90aed3b5f0e7e60.tickets_id
      AND glpi_tickets_users_d1524bb2ea1d461ab90aed3b5f0e7e60.type = 1)
    LEFT JOIN glpi_users AS glpi_users_a5e2026cbcb683e774f93a59e24a62a4
      ON (glpi_tickets_users_d1524bb2ea1d461ab90aed3b5f0e7e60.users_id = glpi_users_a5e2026cbcb683e774f93a59e24a62a4.id)
    LEFT JOIN glpi_tickets_users AS glpi_tickets_users_819efb92c8b927b345e489211ec8e43b
      ON (glpi_tickets.id = glpi_tickets_users_819efb92c8b927b345e489211ec8e43b.tickets_id
      AND glpi_tickets_users_819efb92c8b927b345e489211ec8e43b.type = 2)
    LEFT JOIN glpi_users AS glpi_users_f201be21cd638ee780d08cba4ceff0d4
      ON (glpi_tickets_users_819efb92c8b927b345e489211ec8e43b.users_id = glpi_users_f201be21cd638ee780d08cba4ceff0d4.id)
    LEFT JOIN glpi_groups_tickets AS glpi_groups_tickets_819efb92c8b927b345e489211ec8e43b
      ON (glpi_tickets.id = glpi_groups_tickets_819efb92c8b927b345e489211ec8e43b.tickets_id
      AND glpi_groups_tickets_819efb92c8b927b345e489211ec8e43b.type = 2)
    LEFT JOIN glpi_groups AS glpi_groups_1358be41ea7158319a888236ffba5355
      ON (glpi_groups_tickets_819efb92c8b927b345e489211ec8e43b.groups_id = glpi_groups_1358be41ea7158319a888236ffba5355.id)
    LEFT JOIN glpi_itilcategories
      ON (glpi_tickets.itilcategories_id = glpi_itilcategories.id)
    LEFT JOIN glpi_tickettasks
      ON (glpi_tickets.id = glpi_tickettasks.tickets_id)
    LEFT JOIN glpi_taskcategories AS glpi_taskcategories_e5ca2f53018fdc28a31faf534186b3a2
      ON (glpi_tickettasks.taskcategories_id = glpi_taskcategories_e5ca2f53018fdc28a31faf534186b3a2.id)
    LEFT JOIN glpi_slas AS glpi_slas_slas_id_ttr_f3aab278f60e510b77ec99388d401d84
      ON (glpi_tickets.slas_id_ttr = glpi_slas_slas_id_ttr_f3aab278f60e510b77ec99388d401d84.id
      AND glpi_slas_slas_id_ttr_f3aab278f60e510b77ec99388d401d84.type = '0')
    LEFT JOIN glpi_slalevels_tickets
      ON (glpi_tickets.id = glpi_slalevels_tickets.tickets_id)
    LEFT JOIN glpi_slalevels AS glpi_slalevels_b3496fc202f417bdbcf7196c9852bb44
      ON (glpi_slalevels_tickets.slalevels_id = glpi_slalevels_b3496fc202f417bdbcf7196c9852bb44.id)
    LEFT JOIN glpi_slas AS glpi_slas_slas_id_tto_bb5aab1a526f6069c73375c529fafec7
      ON (glpi_tickets.slas_id_tto = glpi_slas_slas_id_tto_bb5aab1a526f6069c73375c529fafec7.id
      AND glpi_slas_slas_id_tto_bb5aab1a526f6069c73375c529fafec7.type = '1')
  WHERE glpi_tickets.is_deleted = 0
  AND (IF(glpi_tickets.time_to_resolve IS NOT NULL
  AND glpi_tickets.status <> 4
  AND (glpi_tickets.solvedate > glpi_tickets.time_to_resolve
  OR (glpi_tickets.solvedate IS NULL
  AND glpi_tickets.time_to_resolve < NOW())), 1, 0) = 1)
  AND glpi_tickets.type = 1
  GROUP BY glpi_tickets.id) chamados
  RIGHT JOIN (SELECT      69 AS chave,      '0-69' AS faixa UNION
    SELECT      70,      '70-89' UNION
    SELECT      90,      '90-100' UNION
    SELECT      101,      'mais de 100') AS faixa_valores
    ON (faixa_valores.chave = chamados.perc_calc_sla)
GROUP BY faixa_valores.faixa,
         chamados.total

panels.title: Evolução do percentual  de SLA dos incidentes
